dict.string: FIRST_TIME
Haha
I don't know what just happened...
I was working on my top secret invention when all of a sudden...
BOOM!
All the lights just turned off!
I don't know what I'm going to do.
Hey!
Do you think you could help me get all the lights back on?
Great!
Let's get started!
NEED_TO_LEARN_SWITCH
So it seems like a lot of the circuits are disconnected.
I think if you reconnect the circuit and restart the power the lights will turn back on.
Drag your finger over the orange switches to draw wires
Use these wires to try and connect the circuit and all the lightbulbs.
When you're done
tap the battery to see if it works!
Good Luck!
NEED_TO_LEARN_SHORT
You're doing a great job with
these lights but there is something you should watch for out.
One thing that could go wrong is you can "short" the circuit.
This happens if you connect the battery to itself without a lightbulb in the path of electricity.
I don't even know what will happen if you start the power with a short circuit...
Keep it up!
NEED_TO_LEARN_BOMB
Oh my...
It looks like some of my bombs accidently fell on to the circuit.
I thing you should avoid connecting the bombs at all costs!
Who knows what could happen if you set one off...
NEED_TO_LEARN_LASER
I almost forgot to tell you!
Some of the circuits in my labratory use lasers!
I'll explain how they work.
If you connect an emitter to a battery it will shoot out a laser.
If you get a laser to hit an receiver, it will act like a new battery.
In order to complete some circuits you will have to aim the lasers from
an emitter so that it hits a receiver.
You can aim the lasers using the defelctors that are all around my lab.
The deflector takes a laser beam and redirects it to another direction.
If you shoot a laser at a deflector,
it will deflect the laser through all of its openings
Tap on the deflector to change its type.
Put your finger on the deflector and then drag your finger around
in a circle to orient the deflector in any way you want.
Be careful!
The lasers are very high intensity and if a laser hits a bomb,
it will most likely detonate it!
